trans:
•
Types of computers based on their capabilities, sizes, and uses
•
Mainframe (large computer) -2 is a common central computer used in
universities, airlines, and data centers.
It can be connected to many terminal units through a time-sharing operating system, allowing hundreds of users to work simultaneously.
3- Mini-Computers
This type of computer has become important as microcomputers now possess advanced capabilities, matching the speed and functions of mini-computers.
Types of computers based on their capabilities, sizes, and uses
4- Micro-Computer is a term used for small-sized computers that contain a microprocessor.
(microprocessor).
Personal Computer is the most common term used for what is known as a personal computer. It has become essential for many small companies.
•
Forms of microcomputers Desktop Computer
Laptop/Notebook
Palm (PDA)
Forms of microcomputers 5- Personal Digital Assistant
(PDA)
It is a small computer used for data entry and commands via a digital pen, and it contains a keyboard. It also has internal memory for storage
